casebody.data:
LESTEP, INC.
v.
Roney L. SMITH, and wife, Bernetha R. Bullock Smith. No. 633P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 5, 2005. George Ligon, Jr., Raleigh, for Smith & Smith. Samuel Roberti, Durham, for Lestep, Inc.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 21st day of December 2004 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th day of May 2005."
